name: TopNewsReader
0:
”Alexa ask Top News Reader to get news sources”
”Alexa ask Top News Reader to read the telegraph”
”Alexa ask Top News Reader what is the latest news from cnn”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: top news reader
des: Top News Reader provides short abstracts of the top news from over 50 news sources. You can get a list of possible news sources and then request to listen to the latest news from a new source in the list.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
